title: VisionAI
description: VisionAI is an AI based Object detection application build with Next.js and Tensorflow.js

title: eVault
description: The E-Wallet Application is a modern, scalable web application for managing and recording financial transactions.

title: Realtime-Device-Tracker
description: This project is a real-time device tracking application built with Node.js, Socket.io, and Leaflet. The application allows you to track and display the location of devices on a map in real-time.

title: Prods
description: An E-commerce application,The E-Commerce Application is a modern, full-featured online shopping platform, allows users to browse products, add them to their cart, and make purchases

title: State-management-lib
description: A lightweight state management solution designed for complex applications where existing libraries might be overkill. This library provides a simple and intuitive API for managing application state.

title: Pizzeria
description: Pizzeria is a modern pizza delivery application that allow users to browse the menu, and manage their accounts, all through a user-friendly interface.

title: Url-Shortner
description: A simple URL shortner that allows you to shorten URLs and resolve them back to the original form.It's a lightweight solution for managing and shortening URLs
